version_description: La vida es más fácil con un solo clic, ¿verdad? Ahora, desde el listado puedes hacer 3 cosas directamente: ver las fotos del piso que te gustan, llamar o contactar con el anunciante. ¡Seguro que ahorras tiempo!

La vida es más fácil con un solo clic, ¿verdad? Ahora, desde el listado puedes hacer 3 cosas directamente: ver las fotos del piso que te gustan, llamar o contactar con el anunciante. ¡Seguro que ahorras tiempo!

We have news for you this summer!
 
Who wants to be in front of a computer when you can go to the beach? We know that looking for an apartment during the summer is much better from your iPad, so we have news for you!
 
What’s new on this version?
 
· The list of apartments is much more visual and the photos larger to make sure you find what you’re looking for before you click. You’ll be able to make up your mind faster with less clicks!

· We have improved the design! When you find the apartment you like, once you click on the detail you’ll see the top information at a glance. The most important characteristics are featured at the top and the photo gallery is much more visible. We know a picture is worth a thousand words! 

· We’ve also increased the size of the map to help you find what you’re looking for faster. You will no longer need glasses!
 
 
We wish you a happy summer and hope you find what you’re looking for soon!

What’s new:
· We have improved your searches! Now when you go to “My searches”, if we have no new apartments to show you, you’ll automatically see your last saved searches again.
· We’ve changed our cover photo! Now when you open the app you’ll have views of the city in the background

- We added the landscape mode to the full-screen photo gallery. Discover all the spaces of the house like never before!
- We improve your experience with the photos. Now, the full screen display starts with the photo you select and not with the first one on the carousel.
- We update our chat! Receive notifications when you have new messages, send images and block the users you want.

¡New release! Now, fotocasa app has important novelties:
-    Finally, you can draw in the map the area in which you want to search. Select the perimeter on the screen and we’ll show the available homes in that area.
-    Also, if the last search was made through the map, the next time you connect to the app you’ll go directly to the map search.

¡New release! Now, fotocasa app has important novelties:
-    Finally, you can draw in the map the area in which you want to search. Select the perimeter on the screen and we’ll show the available homes in that area.
-    Also, if the last search was made through the map, the next time you connect to the app you’ll go directly to the map search.

¡New release! Now, fotocasa app has important novelties:
-    Finally, you can draw in the map the area in which you want to search. Select the perimeter on the screen and we’ll show the available homes in that area.
-    Also, if the last search was made through the map, the next time you connect to the app you’ll go directly to the map search.

We add new features to our maps!
- Now, depends on the zoom in the map view, at the bottom you can see a list of the floors of the area with the basic information (price, meters and rooms) of these.
- This listing allows you to save in favorites those apartments you are interested in without having to clic into the ad detail!
- Another novelty is that the properties you've already seen are marked on the map with the POI in gray. So you can know if there are new properties in the area or if you have left any possibility to explore.

We add new features to our maps!
- Now, depends on the zoom in the map view, at the bottom you can see a list of the floors of the area with the basic information (price, meters and rooms) of these.
- This listing allows you to save in favorites those apartments you are interested in without having to clic into the ad detail!
- Another novelty is that the properties you've already seen are marked on the map with the POI in gray. So you can know if there are new properties in the area or if you have left any possibility to explore.

- Now, when the price tag is shown by the number of houses or zoom level, at the bottom of the map you’ll find a mini-detail of the ad.
- This mini-detail incorporates all the functionalities of the normal detail: see all the photos, to save as favorites, discard, call or contact via e-mail with the advertiser. All in one screen, without having to leave the view by map!
- Remove the properties you aren’t interested in from the list and the map. Swipe your finger and click on the trash icon to discard the property. In the "Discarded" section of the side menu, you can retrieve the ads you want. Available from the listing, map, mini-detail and detail.
- Fixed some small bugs to make your experience perfect.

- Now, you can search, see your favorites, your alerts or your messages directly through the tabs we’ve added at the bottom of the screen.
- The tabs have an independent navigation. So, you can keep your searches or your favorites where you left them, even if you switch to another tab.
- Also, the search tab is visible at all times.
- You can start or close your session, publish a property, see your ads, your discards, search by map, access to our blog…
- We have also added a top bar that indicates the search you’re looking. If you select it, you can change the search.
- The new version is optimized for iphone X.

- Hemos realizado algunas mejoras para ofrecer la mejor experiencia.
- Ahora, accede al buscador, tus favoritos, tus alertas o tus mensajes directamente a través de las pestañas que hemos añadido en la parte inferior de la pantalla. - Las pestañas tienen una navegación independiente. Así, puedes mantener tus búsquedas o tus favoritos por donde los dejaste, aunque cambies a otra pestaña. - Además, con este cambio, la opción buscar está visible en todo momento. - En la pestaña “Más”, puedes iniciar o cerrar tu sesión, publicar un piso, ver tus anuncios, tus descartados, buscar por mapa o acceder a nuestro blog, entre otras opciones. - También hemos añadido una barra superior que indica en todo momento cuál es la búsqueda que estás viendo. Si te sitúas en ella, puedes cambiar la búsqueda. - Versión optimizada para iPhone X.

Perdón. Sabemos que, en las últimas semanas, nuestra app no funcionaba demasiado bien, por eso hemos centrado nuestros esfuerzos en solucionar los problemas que nos habíais reportado.

Hemos arreglado algunos errores de navegación que generaban descripciones cortadas, problemas con los filtros de los precios, fallos a la hora de visualizar anuncios o cierres inesperados de la aplicación.
También hemos mejorado el rendimiento y la experiencia de usuario del sistema de alertas de Fotocasa. Entre otras cosas, ahora ya puedes consultar los resultados de tus búsquedas directamente, sin tener que pasar por la Home.

Además, hemos renovado la visualización de los filtros para que la navegación sea más clara. Con ese mismo objetivo de transparencia, ahora puedes ver toda la información del certificado energético de las viviendas. 

Actualiza la app de Fotocasa y ¡encuentra dónde vas a vivir!

Sabemos lo importante que es tu tiempo, por eso, ahora ya puedes consultar tu historial de búsquedas. Sólo tienes que situarte en la caja del buscador para recuperar búsquedas anteriores, ¡hasta con los filtros que aplicaste!

Además, para que te puedas acotar más la búsqueda, hemos recuperado los filtros relacionados con garajes, trasteros y locales. También vuelve a estar disponible el filtro “Se aceptan mascotas” para pisos de alquiler, que habíamos perdido hacía un tiempo y que tanto nos pedís.

En esta actualización, también hemos realizado algunas mejoras técnicas y del detalle de los anuncios. Por último, hemos rediseñado las pantallas de inicio de sesión y registro, para que disfrutes de la mejor experiencia de usuario. 

No esperes más, ¡actualízate la app!

Searching in company is easier and… fun!

We know that a large part of people looking for a home do so together with other people: with their partner, with their children, with their parents or with friends. Searching in company allows the exchange of opinions about the flats or houses that you like.

For this reason, when you bookmark an ad for a property we make it easy for you to share it by email, WhatsApp, Telegram ... with the people you want so they will know at all times which are the flats that interest you.

And as always, we continue to strive to make the application more useful, beautiful and practical in each version.

Now, if you have iOS 14, you can add Fotocasa's widget in your start screen or in the Today's view of your device, and discover ads related to your recent searches. To see them, you only have to press above an empty space and click to the button +, or do it from the menu of the button +, and select the size of the widget, there are two different kinds to choose from. The recommendations will start to appear, within the days, as you use the app. Don't wait more time, personalize your iPhone or iPad with our widget and find your place.

In this version we bring you a novelty that will revolutionize the way of finding a flat: the guided virtual tour.

When you find an interesting apartment, you can ask a real estate agent to guide you on a virtual tour, showing you the apartment remotely and solve all the doubts you have, wherever you are.

With this new functionality, your search experience will be easier, faster, more comfortable and flexible.

You will be able to identify the ads that offer a virtual guided tour with a tag in the ad and a new section in the detail. In the contact form you can indicate that you want to take a virtual guided tour. You will be able to locate the advertisements with a guided virtual tour by ordering the results.
